caption: Three men stand on the ground, and suddenly, many warm-colored glowing orbs appear. A gigantic creature emerges, and they hastily board an aircraft to escape. A massive pink object appears before them, and the three men embrace each other. A boy approaches a blue creature and shares a hug. Four people and a dog stand on the deck of the aircraft. They find themselves in a pink world filled with bizarre creatures. Inside the cockpit, the airship flies out of a cave, taking them to a seaside location. They embrace on the deck. A man opens a mailbox and finds a letter. An old bearded man arrives at a house, greeted at the door. In the city at night, people illuminate candles. Two men pick apples in a field. The camera then zooms out to reveal the entire Earth. The sequence is followed by a series of other scenes.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(What is the style of the movie?Does it look like cartoon movie?)
global.answer: No. It seems like a cartoon movie.
